name: Whittier High School
description: A historic high school in Whittier, California, known for its role in film and television.

content.title: Overview
content.body: **Whittier High School** is a public high school located in Whittier, California, serving as a key educational institution in the area since its establishment. The school is known not only for its academic programs but also for its iconic buildings and architecture.

content.title: Film History
content.body: Whittier High School has been featured in various film and television productions. It famously doubled for Hill Valley High School in the movie _Back to the Future_, where several important scenes were filmed. Other productions have utilized the location for its classic American high school facade.

content.title: Visiting
content.body: Visitors to Whittier High School can typically access the campus during normal school hours, though permission may be needed for non-students. The school sometimes offers special tours focusing on its film history for fans and tourists.
